verses.content: Chuong lai chun hieng hi a nih a, Juda chu a unauhai laia inthawk chu a fe thlah a, Adullam mi pakhat a hming Hira chu a zu bêl tah a.
Juda chun chutaka chun Kanaan mi pakhat a hming Sua naunu a hmuh a, ama chu a neia a pâwl tah a.
Chuongchun, ân rai a, naupasal a nei a; chun, Juda chun a hmingah Er a sak a.
Chun, ân rai nâwk a, naupasal a nei nâwk a; chun, a nuin a hmingah Onan a sak a.
Chun, naupasal a nei nâwk a, a hmingah Selah a sak a: chu chu a nei lai chun Juda chu Chezib-ah a um a.
Juda chun a nau lutîr Er chu nuhmei a neipêk a, a hming chu Tamar a nih.
Nisienlakhawm, Juda nau lutîr Er chu LALPA mithmuah mi suol a nih a, LALPAIN ama chu a sukhlum tah a.
Chun, Juda chun Onan kuomah, “I u nuhmei chu pâwl la, pasalhai unau thaw ding chu thawpêk la, i u ta ding chun chi thlapêk rawh,” a tih a.
Nisienlakhawm, Onan chun chithla ding chu ama thla a ni naw ding a nih ti a hriet a; chuongchun, a u nuhmei a pâwl po leh a u ta dinga chi thlapêk lo dingin a chi chu hnuoiah a sukthlâk hlak a.
A thilthaw chu LALPA mithmua chun suoltak a nih; chuleiin, ama khawm chu a sukhlum tah a.

Juda chun a monu Tamar kuoma chun, “Ka naupa Selah hi a puitling hmakhat chu i pa in tieng pasal nei loin lo um phawt rawh,” a tih a. “Chuong naw chun ama khawm hi a uhai angin thi rawi a tih,” a ti a nih. Chuongchun, Tamar chu a pa in tieng chun a va um tah a.
Chun, a nakie chun Sua naunu, Juda nuhmei chu, a thih a; chun, a ngai a hung bo a, Timnaa berâm hmul vawtuhai kuom tieng chun ama le a ruolpa Adullam mi Hira chu an hang feh a.
Chun, Tamar chu, “I tarpupa chu a berâm hmul vaw dingin Timnaah a hang fe ding a nih,” ti hril a nih a.

Ama chun a pasal sûnna silfênhai chu a hlîp a, inkhumna puonin ân khum a, ân tuom tlat a, Timna lampuia Enaim kul kawt- khâra chun a lo ṭhung a: Selah chu a puitling ta sih a, a pa chun a nuhmei dingin ân neitir naw zo a ni tah ti a hriet sih a.
Chun, Judain ama chu a hmuin nawchizawr amanih a sâwn a, a hmai chu ân khum tlat sih a.

Chuongchun, lampui sîra nu- hmei tieng chu a va pan a, “Hung ta, lunginsiettakin zâl hmunkhat ei tih,” a tih a; a mo kha a nih ti a hriet si nawh a. Ama chun, “I mi zâlpui chun iengam mi pêng i ta?” a tih a.
Ama chun, “Ran ruol laia kêlte inphur ka ti che,” a tih a. Chun, ama chun, “Chu chu i mi hung inphur hmaa lo hrên ding iemani bêk i mi pêk ding?” a tih a.

Ama chun, “Hrên ding ieng am pêng ka ti cheh a?” a tih a. Amanu chun, “I hming namna le i hrui, i hmawl chawi le khan,” a tih a. Chuongchun, a pêk a, a zâlpui tah a; chun, amaa inthawk chun nau a vawn tah a.
Chun, a tho a, a inkhumna puon chu a hlîp a, a hmeithaina silfênhai chu ân bel nâwk tah a.
Chun, Judain a thil hrên chu nuhmei kuta inthawk la dingin a ruolpa Adullam mi kutah kêlte chu ân phur a, nisienlakhawm, ama chun a va hmu zo nawh a.
Chuongchun, nuhmei umna laia mihai kuoma chun, “Lampui sira Enaima nawchizawr um kha khaw lai am a um ta leh?” tiin ân dawn a. Anni chun, “Nawchizawr hrim hitaka hin an um nawh ie,” an tih a.
Chuongchun, Juda kuoma chun a kîr nâwk a, “Ama chu ka hmu zo nawh, a hmuna mihai khawmin, ‘Nawchizawr hrim hitaka hin an um nawh,’ an lo ti bawk a,” a tih a.
Juda chun, “Nei sawng el raw se, chuong naw chun muolpho rawi ei tih, en ta, hi kêlte hi kân phur a, ama i hmu zo si nawh a,” a tih a.

Thla thum vêl amani hnunga chun Juda chu, “I monu Tamar chun tlangvâl a dit a, chunawa khawm, ngai ta, sâwn a pai nghe nghe annaw,” tiha hril a nih a. Juda chun, “Ṭhuoi suok unla, raw hlumin um raw se,” a tih a.

Chun, an ṭhuoi suok chun Tamar chun, “Hi thil neitupaa inthawk hin a nih nau ka vawn chu,” tiin, a tarpupa kuoma chun mi a tir a; ama bawkin, “Lunginsiettakin hieng hming namna hai, hrui hai, hmawl hai hi tu ta am a nih en chieng ta khai,” a ti bawk a.

Juda chun chuong thil chu ama ta a nih ti a hriet a, “Ama chu keia nêkin a fel lem a nih, ama chu ka naupa Selah chu kân neitir ta si nawh a,” a tih a. Chun, Juda chun ama chu a pâwl nâwk ta dêr nawh a.
Chun, nauhain a se laiin, ngai ta, a sula chun inphîr an lo um a.
A nau pakhat chun a kut a hung pur dawk a; chuongchun, nau dawm mi chun, “Hi hi a suok hmasa lem a ni hi,” tiin a chel a, a kuta chun pat sen ân buntir a.
A kut chu a kei lût nâwk lai chun, ngai ta, a unau chu a hung suok tah a; chuongchun, nau dawmtu chun, “Iengdinga suokna ding insiem am i nih a?” a tih a, chuleiin, a hmingah Perez an sak a.
Chu hnunga chun a unau pat sen bun kha a hung suok ve a, a hmingah Zera an sak a.
